downloadTitle: .NET Rocks! - David Aiken on Bridging the Gap between Dev and IT
downloadDescription: Carl and Richard talk with David Aiken about how developers can work more productively with IT professionals.
detailsSection: David Aiken is an Architect Evangelist working for Windows Server Evangelism in Redmond. His role, amongst other things, is to promote and evangelize Microsoft's Design for Operations.
systemRequirementsSection: Presentations are played using the Microsoft Windows Media Player.
installInstructionSection:
- Select "Save this Program to Disk" to copy the download to your machine for installation at a later time.
- Once the file has been downloaded, execute it in order to extract the media file.
